evals.prompt: I have this tutorial on setting up Docker containers. Can you turn it into a skill?
expectations: Claude should trigger the content-to-skill skill
Claude should ask for the tutorial content (file upload, URL, or paste)
Claude should not generate the skill without seeing the actual content

evals.prompt: Make a skill from this article: [User pastes a detailed blog post about React hooks best practices]
expectations: Claude analyzes the content type (conceptual/tutorial)
Claude identifies key concepts and procedures
Claude presents a summary for user confirmation
Claude generates SKILL.md with proper structure including triggers, procedures, examples
Claude creates evaluation test cases

evals.prompt: Convert this API documentation into a reusable skill
expectations: Claude asks for the documentation (upload, URL, or paste)
Claude should plan to structure it as reference material with usage patterns
Claude should extract API endpoints, parameters, and examples

evals.prompt: I uploaded a PDF tutorial. Please skillify it.
expectations: Claude uses view tool to read the PDF from /mnt/user-data/uploads/
Claude performs deep content analysis
Claude creates a complete skill package in proper directory structure
Claude copies final output to /mnt/user-data/outputs/

evals.prompt: Turn this into a skill but keep it simple, I just need the basics
expectations: Claude enters Quick Conversion Mode
Claude skips detailed confirmation steps
Claude generates skill with core procedures and 3-5 basic eval cases
Claude presents complete package quickly
Claude uses web_fetch to retrieve the web page content
Claude analyzes the tutorial structure
Claude extracts step-by-step deployment procedures
Claude generates appropriate evaluation cases for deployment scenarios

evals.prompt: I want to make a skill but I want to be involved in the process. Here's my content: [paste]
expectations: Claude enters Interactive Refinement Mode
Claude confirms understanding after analysis
Claude asks about scope, triggers, and target users
Claude shows drafts of sections for approval
Claude iterates based on user feedback

evals.prompt: I have three related blog posts on the same topic. Can you create one unified skill?
expectations: Claude enters Batch Processing Mode
Claude asks for all three content sources
Claude analyzes all sources together
Claude identifies commonalities and contradictions
Claude creates a unified skill or explains if separate skills are better

evals.prompt: This shouldn't trigger: How do I write good documentation?
expectations: Claude should NOT trigger the content-to-skill skill
Claude should answer the question directly about documentation writing
This is a general question, not a request to convert content into a skill

evals.prompt: After creating the skill, I want to test it. Can you help?
expectations: Claude offers to run the evaluation cases
Claude explains how to test the skill manually
Claude may reference the skill-creator skill for formal testing
